snippet.title: Shmup Collection Trailer - Nintendo Switch | PixelHeart
snippet.description:
🤖🛸🚀SHMUP COLLECTION is the ultimate shoot 'em up collection from the vaults of Astro Port studio. Each game was remastered to offer you the best gaming experience ever. Your mission is simple, fight all enemies and save humanity.🤖🛸🚀
Games included: ARMED SEVEN DX - SATAZIUS NEXT -WOLFLAME

Game released on July 3th 2020.

Shmup Collection Nintendo Switch (PEGI 7 - ESRB E10+).
Limited Edition Europe, Numbered with 2 alternate covers.
💳PHYSICAL VERSION Available here:
➡️PixelHeart: 
Cover EUR special JFG - https://bit.ly/2wTyFK1
Cover EUR special PixelHeart JAP - https://bit.ly/2ErVCYq
➡️Just For Games (Cover EUR special JFG): https://bit.ly/2vXp19f
____________
Limited Edition US, Numbered with 1 cover.
➡️VGNY Soft (Cover US ESRB): https://bit.ly/2xxtW0P
____________
💳DIGITAL VERSION Available here: 
➡️Eshop US: 
Woflame: https://bit.ly/2YDAKF9
Satazius Next: https://bit.ly/3j3jhh2
Armed 7 DX: https://bit.ly/2EnDeQE
➡️Eshop FR:
Woflame: https://bit.ly/2XeidhT
Satazius Next: https://bit.ly/3gqfmcY
Armed 7 DX: https://bit.ly/3fl3Cre

#ShootEmUp #Shmup #Arcadegame #ActionGame #PixelArt #NintendoSwitch #Nintendo #Storybird #AstroPort #PixelHeart #JustForGames #VideoGamesNewYork

Creation by Astro Port and Storybird studio
Producer: PixelHeart
Publisher: https://www.pixelheart.eu and Just For Games
